mapper.update: UPDATE OrderRepairLESQueues SET vomLastMessage = #{vomLastMessage}, vomSuccess = #{vomSuccess}, vomSuccessTime = #{vomSuccessTime}, vomReturnData = #{vomReturnData} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE OrderRepairLESQueues SET lastMessage = #{lastMessage}, success = #{success}, successTime = #{successTime}, returnData = #{returnData} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO OrderRepairLESQueues(
siteId,
orderProductId,
orderRepairId,
recordId,
pushData,
returnData,
success,
`count`,
lastMessage,
successTime,
vomLastMessage,
vomSuccess,
vomSuccessTime,
vomReturnData,
vomPushData,
addTime ) VALUES(
#{siteId},
#{orderProductId},
#{orderRepairId},
#{recordId},
#{pushData},
#{returnData},
#{success},
#{count},
#{lastMessage},
#{successTime},
#{vomLastMessage},
#{vomSuccess},
#{vomSuccessTime},
#{vomReturnData},
#{vomPushData},
#{addTime} )

INSERT INTO LesShippingInfos (orderId,orderProductId,cOrderSn, nodeTime, deliveryType, nodeCode, nodeDesc, addTime, logId, syncTBStatus) VALUES (#{orderId},#{orderProductId},#{cOrderSn}, #{nodeTime}, #{deliveryType}, #{nodeCode}, #{nodeDesc}, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(), #{logId}, #{syncTBStatus})
